specifications.Finish: Decoration > Sequin Sequin fabric is a stylish material covered with flat plastic or metal embellishments that come in various sizes, shapes, and colors. It creates a sparkling, eye-catching effect and is commonly used for partywear, evening gowns, and stage costumes.
specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric. Yarn Effect > Boucle BouclÃ© is a fabric characterized by its looped, knotted, or curled texture on the surface. It can be made from various materials, not just wool, and these unique loops give the fabric a warm feel and a rich, dimensional appearance. Yarn Effect > Fancy Yarn Fancy yarns are specialty yarns, such as feather yarn, eyelash yarn, and novelty yarn, that add unique textures and visual effects to fabrics, making them stand out.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Knit > Low Gauge Knit Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric. Yarn Effect > Boucle Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Recommended Use Cardigans
